Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Miaochuang (aigc.yizhentv.com) is a cutting-edge intelligent content generation platform developed by New One Technology. Built on the New One Video Large Model and the Yizhen AIGC Intelligent Engine, it provides users with AI-powered creative services such as AI-assisted writing, text-to-speech, AI-generated art, and AI video production (AI complete videos). By intelligently analyzing scripts, materials, voice synthesis, subtitles, and more, Miaochuang enables rapid adjustments and quick video creation, offering zero-threshold video production. It enhances content production efficiency and empowers creators of images, videos, marketing, converged media, financial insurance, e-commerce, local lifestyle, and other vertical fields. The platform has served over 2 million self-media bloggers and related organizations to date. Since its launch, it has gained widespread popularity through collaborations like the AI Art Competition with Weibo, becoming the exclusive AIGC cooperation platform at the 2023 Changsha Weibo Influencer Festival, where attendees experienced unique AIGC applications. Additionally, it co-hosted the National Centre for the Performing Arts' image generation exhibition *Danceâ€¢Shadow: Dancing at the Tip of a Pen*, which was highly acclaimed. Yizhen Miaochuang continues to deepen AIGC technology, driving the "AIGC+" transformation of content consumption and marketing ecosystems.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Miaochuang leverages the XinYi Video Large Model and the Yizhen AIGC Intelligent Engine to provide services such as AI-assisted writing, text-to-speech, AI-generated art, and video creation, significantly improving content production efficiency. The data stored on the Filecoin network includes various creative outputs, ranging from text to multimedia, such as AI-generated works and user-uploaded content. This data supports the development of multiple vertical fields like marketing and converged media, driving the "AIGC+" transformation of content consumption ecosystems.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: As a Filecoin data preparer, I would use tools like IPFS, Lotus, and Python scripts to clean, shard, and encrypt the data, while leveraging distributed storage technology to ensure data security and retrievability.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe, Australia (continent), Antarctica
